item.title: Thanksgiving Song - Ukulele Play Along (with lyrics) - Key of G
item.description:
Thanksgiving Song by Mary Chapin Carpenter. It’s been lowered by 2 semitones so beginner ukulele students can play along. For educational use. Chords Used: G C D Am Em
There are chords shown for soprano, concert, tenor, and BARITONE ukuleles.
This is the lyric version. The same video without lyrics may be found here: https://youtu.be/Y1xn68ri4xY
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: You Gotta Sing Ukulele Play Along - Key of Am
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of Am.
Chords Used: Am, E7, Dm
As performed by Nancy Cassidy.
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/JWGOXTMNwSA
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. Video from motionbolt.com.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6
We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: He's Got The Whole World In His Hands - Ukulele Play Along Video - Very Easy - Key of C
item.description:
Ukulele Play Along - Very Easy
He's Got The Whole World In His Hands - Nursery Rhyme
Using the chords: C and G7
Suggested Strum Pattern - D D D D
Ideal for younger children in primary or elementary school. This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Sudha - Wendeyaho - Key of C
item.description:
Wendeyaho (We n’ de ya ho), also known as the Cherokee Morning Song, by Sudha. A rough translation is: I am of the great spirit, yes I am. It’s been lowered by 2 semitones so beginner musicians can play along. For educational use. Chords Used: C, F, G
Across the USA many states are changing “Columbus Day” to an observance of “Indigenous Peoples' Day”. This is a perfect song for students to play in October, or anytime of the year.
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: Simon & Garfunkel - Scarborough Fair / Canticle - Key of E
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of E Dorian (built on the second step of the D Major scale)
Chords Used: Em, D, G, A
As performed by Simon & Garfunkel
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/M0x_G4eA71w
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. The art work is by Pieter Brueghel the Younger (1534-1638) and is entitled "Flemish Fair."
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6

item.title: Guava Jam Ukulele Play Along - Key of C
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C.
Chords Used: C, Gsus4, G7, F, D7, Ab, C7
As performed by The Ka'au Crater Boys.
This song has become a part of the traditional ukulele repertoire as a solo (you can find versions on the web if you would like to learn it), but in this case, you will be acting as the "rhythm section" underneath the solo.
I did not create a tutorial for this video, and you can play any strumming pattern that goes along with the rhythm section.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6

item.title: The Kingston Trio - Where Have All The Flowers Gone? - Key of C
item.description:
For educational use. Chords Used: C Am F G
"Where Have All the Flowers Gone" by The Kingston Trio. It’s been digitally raised by 2 semitones so beginner ukulele students can play along. The lyric video by YouTuber jasmine e may be found here (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bI3QVsW30j0), I just added the chords.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6 . We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Careless Love Baritone Ukulele Play Along - Baritone Ukulele - Key of F
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for DGBE ukulele. Key of E.
Chords Used: E, B7, E7, A, D#6, E6
As performed by Anita Carter.

item.title: Between the Devil and the Deep Blue Sea Ukulele Play Along - Key of F, A
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for CGEA ukulele. Keys of F and A.
Chords Used: F, Dm, Gm, C7, F7, Bb, Bbm,, C+, A, F#m, Bm, E7, G, Eb, C#7, Bdim7, Dm7
Original performance by George Harrison
[Corrected Version from the Original Upload]
Our local ukulele group is working on this song, and I was asked to check out the chords they are using (and the tablature they are using), and I made a play along video (there is no tablature in this song).
Do you enjoy these videos? If so, please click on the tutorial video and subscribe to the sister channel to this channel. This channel will feature only video play alongs, and the sister channel will feature all of my original content.
Tutorial Video (History, GCEA chords, & strumming) on the sister channel (please subscribe!): https://youtu.be/8bll9-iQLW8
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The baritone ukulele chord font is from ukefarm.com.
The Motion background video is from motionbolt.com
There is a master list of all similar play along videos at my blog: ukestuff.info. Access to the blog, and all materials on the blog is free.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel!
